The Internet: "Stupid! Developers aren't dead!"

You have to pick a side if you want to make people happy. Centrism is dead.

user.name: Michael Black
user.description: Director, Max Planck Institute for Intelligent Systems (@MPI_IS). Chief Scientist @meshcapade. Building 3D digital humans using vision, graphics, and learning.

fullText:
The use of AI in reviewing is a growing problem. Several of my ICCV papers have AI reviews -- one reviewer was so lazy that they left in the prompts!  

A common refrain that I hear is that people have difficulty writing in English and need to use AI to clean up their review.
